programme.title: The Pink Panther, (1963, Comedy)
programme.desc: Clumsy Inspector Jacques Clouseau (Peter Sellers) chases a jewel thief (David Niven) and his nephew (Robert Wagner).

programme.title: Punk
programme.desc: The Ramones visit London in 1976 to discover a vibrant U.K. punk scene; the Second British Invasion of America includes the Sex Pistols' disastrous U.S. tour and flameout in 1978.

programme.title: Gladiator II, (2024, History)
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honor needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, History)
programme.desc: Enraged by the killing of his wife, Scotsman William Wallace (Mel Gibson) leads a revolt against the tyrannical English king (Patrick McGoohan) in the 13th century.

programme.title: 42, (2013, History)
programme.desc: In 1946, Branch Rickey (Harrison Ford), general manager of the Brooklyn Dodgers, signs Jackie Robinson (Chadwick Boseman) to the team in defiance of major league baseball's notorious color barrier.

programme.title: Billy the Kid
programme.desc: The Lincoln County War is on the verge of kicking off in a big way; Billy has joined Englishman John Tunstall in his commercial battle with Major Murphy and the House, but even bigger players lurk in the background and the stakes are high.

programme.title: Billy the Kid
programme.desc: The war has started, but John Tunstall is hospitalized by a smallpox outbreak.

programme.title: Gangs of New York, (2002, History)
programme.desc: During the era of Tammany Hall's sway, a young man (Leonardo DiCaprio) vows vengeance on the vicious gangster (Daniel Day-Lewis) who killed his father.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Crime boss Vito Corleone (Marlon Brando) and his sons (Al Pacino, James Caan) rule their New York empire with Mafia justice.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II, (1974, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Michael Corleone (Al Pacino) rules his father's criminal empire, while flashbacks recall young Vito's (Robert De Niro) climb to power.

programme.title: The Godfather, Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (1990, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Dignified Michael Corleone (Al Pacino) joins his wild nephew in a Sicilian vendetta involving the Vatican.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: An outlaw (Henry Fonda) working for a railroad magnate fights a stranger (Charles Bronson) for a New Orleans widow's (Claudia Cardinale) land.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: A marshal (Lee Van Cleef), an Eastern reporter and five ex-convicts rescue widows from Mexican bandits.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: A man and his wife move to a quaint suburb where most of the women seem to have the same bland personality.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem, (2023, Animated)
programme.desc: The Turtle brothers take on a mysterious crime syndicate, but they soon get in over their heads when an army of mutants is unleashed upon them.

programme.title: Transformers One, (2024, Animated)
programme.desc: Brothers-in-arms Orion Pax and D-16 become sworn enemies Optimus Prime and Megatron.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: A professional child-finder (Eddie Murphy) is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan boy from a shape-shifting villain (Charles Dance).

programme.title: WarGames, (1983, Thriller)
programme.desc: A teen taps his computer into the NORAD missile-defense system and plays a video game, "Global Thermonuclear War.".

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Dead soldiers from the '60s surface in the '90s as high-tech warriors reanimated by the U.S. government.

programme.title: Stargate, (1994, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A portal takes an Egyptologist (James Spader), a colonel (Kurt Russell) and a team of soldiers to another planet with pyramids, slaves and an alien ruler.

programme.title: Face/Off, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (John Travolta) and his nemesis (Nicolas Cage) trade physical identities.

programme.title: Event Horizon, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A spaceship missing for seven years finally re-emerges and sends out a distress signal. But when a team is sent out to investigate, they discover that something sinister has taken over the craft.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: The characters come together for a final confrontation with unimaginable consequences.

programme.title: Let the Devil In
programme.desc: In 1988, devout Catholic and loving mother was found murdered in her Jefferson, NJ home; investigators uncover satanic symbols and come to realize that her son is missing; was this crime the result of the occultor something far more close to home?

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers, (1956, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A couple (Kevin McCarthy, Dana Wynter) discover that plant-life pods from space are replacing ordinary citizens.

programme.title: The Bounty, (1984, Adventure)
programme.desc: Mate Fletcher Christian (Mel Gibson) leads a mutiny against his friend Lt. Bligh (Anthony Hopkins) on an 18th-century voyage to Tahiti.

programme.title: My Dead Boyfriend, (2016, Romance)
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) goes on a manic quest to learn the truth about her boyfriend after she finds him dead on their couch.

programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: In 1980 Texas, a college freshman (Blake Jenner) meets his new baseball teammates (Will Brittain, Ryan Guzman), an unruly group of disco-dancing, skirt-chasing partyers.

programme.title: Moonstruck, (1987, Romance)
programme.desc: An Italian-American widow (Cher), engaged to a reticent suitor, falls in love with his brother (Nicolas Cage).

programme.title: Orange County, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: A high schooler (Colin Hanks) tries to fix a mistake after his guidance counselor sends the wrong papers to Stanford University.

programme.title: Boomerang, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: A Manhattan playboy (Eddie Murphy) gets a new corporate boss (Robin Givens), and she treats him the way he has always treated women.

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2024, Musical)
programme.desc: A new student gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics. However, when she makes the misstep of falling for the queen bee's ex-boyfriend, she finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: An aging irresponsible misfit (Paul Newman) falls in love with an unhappily married younger woman (Melanie Griffith).

programme.title: The Terminal, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Unauthorized to enter the United States, an Eastern European (Tom Hanks) befriends a flight attendant (Catherine Zeta-Jones) while living in a New York airport.

programme.title: Daddy's Home, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: An insecure man (Will Ferrell) competes for the affection of his stepchildren when their freewheeling father (Mark Wahlberg) breezes back into town.

programme.title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut, (1999, Animated)
programme.desc: Kyle, Stan and Cartman orchestrate a resistance to an imminent war between Canada and the United States.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Following a night of drinking in a ski-resort hot tub, four pals awake in 1986, getting a chance to rewrite the past.

programme.title: Unseen, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: Sam, a gas station clerk, receives a random call from Emily, a nearly blind woman who's running from her murderous ex in the woods. Using a phone, Sam becomes Emily's only chance for survival as she guides the terrified woman through a video call.

programme.title: French Girl, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: When his girlfriend gets swept away to Canada by a job offer from her ex, a hopeless romantic travels to her hometown, only to find himself out of his depth while trying to charm her hard-to-impress, French-speaking family.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge: Chasing the Dream, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: An ice skater (Matt Lanter) and his new partner (Francia Raisa) develop feelings for each other while training to compete in Paris.

programme.title: Pocket Listing, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When a power player and his sultry wife hire a disgraced property broker to discreetly market and sell their Malibu villa, double crosses, adultery, murder and revenge ensue.

programme.title: The Wasp, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two estranged friends unveil a dangerous and deceptive plot that forever changes their lives.

programme.title: The Vikings, (1958, Adventure)
programme.desc: Two Vikings (Kirk Douglas, Tony Curtis) clash over a Welsh princess (Janet Leigh) and control of a British throne, unaware that they are half brothers.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: A master hit man (Charles Bronson) teaches the trade to an eager young man (Jan-Michael Vincent) who idolizes him.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Western)
programme.desc: An Old West sharpshooter goes to Australia, where his new boss expects him to kill Aboriginal Australians.

programme.title: Carrie, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: Tormented by her peers and sheltered by her religious mother (Julianne Moore), an awkward teenager (Chlo Grace Moretz) unleashes her hidden, telekinetic powers after a sick prank at her senior prom pushes her over the edge.

programme.title: Blink Twice, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: When tech billionaire Slater King meets Frida, he invites her to join him and his friends for a dream vacation on his private island. However, when strange things start to happen, she'll have to uncover the truth if she hopes to make it out alive.

programme.title: A Working Man, (2025, Action)
programme.desc: Levon Cade left behind a military career in the black ops to live a simple life. However, when human traffickers kidnap his boss's daughter, his search to bring her home uncovers a world of corruption far greater than he ever could have imagined.

programme.title: The Patriot, (2000, War)
programme.desc: A pacifist farmer (Mel Gibson) of South Carolina reluctantly joins the Revolutionary War and fights alongside his son (Heath Ledger).

programme.title: Mission: Impossible -- Dead Reckoning, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team must track down a terrifying new weapon that threatens all of humanity if it falls into the wrong hands. With control of the future and the fate of the world at stake, a deadly race around the globe begins.

programme.title: There's Something Wrong With the Children, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Margaret and Ben take a weekend trip with two longtime friends and their two young children. Ben soon suspects something sinister is afoot when the kids start behaving strangely after disappearing into the woods overnight.

programme.title: The Last Castle, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: A court-martialed general (Robert Redford) leads a revolt against a corrupt warden (James Gandolfini) in a military prison.

programme.title: The Quiet Man, (1952, Drama)
programme.desc: An Irish-born boxer (John Wayne) returns to his homeland to reclaim his family's farm and begins a turbulent romance with a beautiful spitfire (Maureen O'Hara).

programme.title: The Long Goodbye, (1973, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Raymond Chandler's private eye Philip Marlowe (Elliott Gould) meets a fun couple (Nina van Pallandt, Sterling Hayden) in 1970s Los Angeles.

programme.title: Hot Pursuit, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: An uptight and by-the-book cop tries to protect the widow of a drug boss as they race through Texas pursued by crooked cops and murderous gunmen.

programme.title: Be Cool, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: Chili Palmer (John Travolta) runs afoul of music-industry players when he teams up with a friend's widow (Uma Thurman) to produce a singer's debut album.

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: A pregnant police chief (Frances McDormand) probes the murderous events that evolved from a desperate car salesman's (William H. Macy) kidnapping scheme.

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman, (1982, Drama)
programme.desc: A hardened loner (Richard Gere) shapes up for a military drill instructor (Louis Gossett Jr.) and a factory girl (Debra Winger) from town.

programme.title: Moonstruck, (1987, Romance)
programme.desc: An Italian-American widow (Cher), engaged to a reticent suitor, falls in love with his brother (Nicolas Cage).

programme.title: Overboard, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: A yachtsman's (Edward Herrmann) wife (Goldie Hawn) falls overboard, forgets who she is and becomes an Oregon carpenter's (Kurt Russell) mate.

programme.title: Notting Hill, (1999, Romance)
programme.desc: A man's (Hugh Grant) life changes when an international star (Julia Roberts) walks into his bookshop.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge, (1992, Romance)
programme.desc: An ex-hockey player (D.B. Sweeney) and a prima donna (Moira Kelly) bicker as paired figure skaters shooting for the Olympics.

programme.title: Moonstruck, (1987, Romance)
programme.desc: An Italian-American widow (Cher), engaged to a reticent suitor, falls in love with his brother (Nicolas Cage).

programme.title: Radio Days, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: A New York boy's (Seth Green) life and a cigarette girl's (Mia Farrow) story recall World War II-era radio.

programme.title: Moby Dick, (1956, Adventure)
programme.desc: The captain of the Pequod risks his life and crew in an obsessive quest to kill the legendary whale that maimed him.

programme.title: Dreamer: Inspired by a True Story, (2005, Children)
programme.desc: A racehorse trainer (Kurt Russell) and his daughter (Dakota Fanning) nurse a gravely injured filly back to health and aim for a slot in the Breeders' Cup Classic.

programme.title: Benny & Joon, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: An eccentric's (Johnny Depp) arrival complicates the lives of a protective brother (Aidan Quinn) and his mentally ill sister (Mary Stuart Masterson).

programme.title: Overboard, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: A yachtsman's (Edward Herrmann) wife (Goldie Hawn) falls overboard, forgets who she is and becomes an Oregon carpenter's (Kurt Russell) mate.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Bridge, (1990, Drama)

programme.title: Intersection, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: An architect (Richard Gere) on the brink of a car accident recalls troubles with his wife (Sharon Stone) and his mistress (Lolita Davidovich) in Vancouver, British Columbia.

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Crime Story)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: The Wood, (1999, Drama)

programme.title: Unidos pelo Destino, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Sentindo falta de propsito em sua vida, Anna se v desolada e passa a fazer parte de um grupo de voluntrios da igreja local. Durante os trabalhos, ela conhece diferentes famlias, com diferentes problemas, e surge uma bela amizade entre ela e Maria

programme.title: Jac, (1994, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Na terra de Canaan vive Isaac, filho de Abrao. Ele e Rebeca tm dois filhos: Esau e Jac. Esau um corajoso e forte caador, enquanto que Jac mais gentil e humilde.

programme.title: Os Meninos que Enganavam Nazistas, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Dois irmos judeus fogem por toda a Frana durante a ocupao alem na Segunda Guerra Mundial, tentando encontrar sua famlia novamente.

programme.title: O Mistrio da F, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: Uma pequena cidade do interior enfrenta os desafios contra os bons costumes por adolescentes que se entregaram as drogas, desafiando os mistrios da f moderna.

programme.title: O Milagre de Natal de Jonathan Toomey, (2007, Children)
programme.desc: Quando um menino perde o prespio de madeira que o liga ao pai morto, sua me preocupada convence um entalhador solitrio e mal-humorado a criar um substituto e permitir que seu filho o veja trabalhar nele.

programme.title: Torturado por Cristo, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Uma releitura cinematogrfica do testemunho do fundador de 'A Voz dos Mrtires', Pastor Richard Wurmbrand, conforme escrito em seu best-seller internacional "Torturado por Cristo".

programme.title: A Cano de Bernadette, (1946, Drama)

programme.title: Alex Rider Contra o Tempo, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Alex Rider, adolescente britnico habilidoso em lingustica, mergulho, artes marciais e tiro, recrutado pelo MI6. Sua primeira misso investigar o bilionrio Darrius Sayle, que fez suspeitas doaes de mega computadores s escolas da Inglaterra.

programme.title: O Jovem Viking, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Halvdan no o tipo perfeito de viking, pois manca e considerado pelas outras crianas um estranho solitrio e sem amigos. Um dia, durante suas excurses solitrias ao rio, ele encontra Meia, a filha corajosa do rei.

programme.title: Um Amor para Recordar, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um jovem delinquente do ensino mdio obrigado a ser o tutor de uma escola de baixa renda. L, ele se apaixona pela filha do pastor e vive uma paixo cheia de diferenas e surpresas.

programme.title: Uma Aventura e Tanto, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: O co vira-lata Pluto aparece de repente e muda a vida da famlia Davis, que est enfrentando tempos difceis. Em pouco tempo, ele salva uma criana, traz conforto a um garoto doente e repara um relacionamento desgastado de pai e filho.

programme.title: Uma Paixo em Seoul, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Kim uma jovem filipina que vive com seus pais superprotetores. Quando descobre uma vaga para ensinar ingls a um empresrio em Seul, ela foge para uma vida nova. Ela s no espera viver um tringulo amoroso com seu aluno e o assistente dele.

programme.title: Uma Viagem para a Espanha, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Steve Coogan e Rob Brydon conhecem restaurantes e hotis da costa espanhola, trocando piadas e impresses sobre seus almoos, conversando sobre paternidade, masculinidade e envelhecimento.

programme.title: Sem Segurana Nenhuma, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Trs jornalistas se juntam para fazer o perfil do homem que fez um anncio em um jornal procurando companhia para correr riscos em uma viagem no tempo.

programme.title: Esprito de Famlia, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um escritor precisa enfrentar a morte repentina de seu pai, mas, aps o enterro, o esprito do falecido aparece para o filho. O rapaz tem que aprender a conviver com essa inusitada e complicada companhia, j que o nico que pode v-lo.

programme.title: Sem Rastros, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que uma menina desaparece de um parque de trailers, o pai e a me da garota decidem fazer justia com as prprias mos. A busca desesperada dos pais pela verdade acaba levando a uma revelao chocante.

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Bakura aciona a Tbua do Destino, que far Yugi perder automaticamente em cinco turnos! Como se isso j no fosse ruim, o Santurio das Trevas de Bakura afeta os pontos de vida de Yugi a cada ataque! Incapaz de atacar e ficando sem tempo, Yugi est preso!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Naruto and Haruna are confronted by Renga. Declaring that he has taken down others before them, he advances on Naruto, ordering him to hand over the princess!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The princess has gained weight due to nerves and wants Ino to pose as the princess in order to attend the first meeting with a prince she adores.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Lee opens a dojo because he feels like he isn't keeping up with his training. He is hoping challengers will come to his dojo to face him in battle.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The first lady of the Land of Honey and her entourage have disappeared. Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata are sent on a mission and they discover an eerie castle looming in the middle of the road!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: During Lee's medical check-up, he discovers that there's a lot of damage in his chakra network. Guy tries to cheer him up by taking Lee to the Academy training hall.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Seeking revenge for his dead father, Genho, Yagura's true identity and oldest sibling of the Ryudoin Brothers confronts Guy using a unique Jutsu.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The ANBU Black Ops suspect that Genno, a carpenter of Hidden Leaf Village, stole important blueprints of the village. Tsunade concludes that the one who used Genno plans to attack the Village and puts the village on Super S-Rank Alert!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: ANBU Black Ops puts Naruto under retro-hypnosis to extract Genno's motives. Without much success, Hidden Waterfall Village will be conducting maneuvers close to the village borders.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While looking for the scattered blueprints, Naruto and his team realize that Genno's actions are a diversion.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are shocked at the number of paper bombs placed throughout the village. While removing the seals, unexpected help arrives in the way of Homura and Koharu.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto confronts Genno, and Shikamaru realizes that all the traps are all diversions. Genno's intention was to bury the village in a rockslide. Can the 11 ninjas save the village from destruction?
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto Uzumaki and Sakura Haruno take the microphones as hosts and then the program begins.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto encounters a young girl named Yakumo drawing a strange picture. The ANBU Black Ops and the Medical Corps arrive and whisk her away.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto has a dream about Yakumo wishing to become a ninja and Kurenai threatens to seal her power.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The assailants are members of the Kurama Clan of Hidden Leaf Village. Naruto and company rush to the villa to protect Yakumo.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto goes to the hospital, when Unkai the ninja, who attacked them at the villa, appears. They search the village and come up with a theory based on the movement of Shinos parasitic insects.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: 48 Hrs., (1982, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Nolte is a rough-edged cop after two vicious cop-killers. He can't do it without the help of smooth Murphy, who is serving time for a half-million dollar robbery.

programme.title: The Thieves, (2012, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: A cat burglar and his gang are hired by a devious former partner to steal a $20 million diamond from a Chinese gangster's mistress.

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: Our non-heinous heroes Bill (Alex Winter) and Ted (Keanu Reeves) are in danger of flunking history! But when the righteous Rufus (George Carlin) arrives in a time-travelling phone booth, the dense dudes discover their destiny!

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this sequel to BILL & TED'S EXCELLENT ADVENTURE, the dimwitted duo travel to Heaven, Hell and points in between as they meet (among others) Albert Einstein, the Easter Bunny and the Grim Reaper.

programme.title: Bill & Ted Face the Music, (2020, Comedy)
programme.desc: Yet to fulfill their rock and roll destiny, the stakes are higher than ever for the now middle-aged Bill and Ted who set out on a new adventure when a visitor from the future warns them that only their song can save life as we know it.

programme.title: River's Edge, (1986, Thriller)
programme.desc: The lives of a group of teenagers are thrown into a moral spin when one murders his girlfriend. Faced with the brutal reality of death, each must decide whether to turn their friend in to the police.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: Hardball, (2001, Drama)
programme.desc: An aimless young man who is scalping tickets, gambling and drinking, agrees to coach a Little League team from the Cabrini Green housing project in Chicago as a condition of getting a loan from a friend.

programme.title: The Whole Truth, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves is a defense attorney trying to clear a teen in the brutal stabbing of his father. As more evidence comes to light, the whole truth seems darker than ever.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Idle Hands, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: The devil will find work for idle hands to do, but what happens when he chooses the laziest teen slacker in the world to do his dirty work? Anton Tobias is a couch potato burn-out who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand. Rated: R

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ace Ventura Pet Detective is on the case to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot and quarterback Dan Marino. He goes eye to eye with sharks, stakes out the Miami Dolphins and woos and wows the ladies. He always gets his man...or beast.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Africa's the place where Ace is on the case, setting out to rescue an animal he loathes - a bat! If you're ready to laugh like a pack of hyenas, if you want more fun than an industrial-sized barrel of monkeys, you'll know what to do. Heed the call.

programme.title: Brannigan, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan and Richard Attenborough co-stars as British policeman Cmdr. Swann in this action-comedy. Brannigan teams up in the U.K. with Cmdr Swann to escort a crime boss back to the U.S.

programme.title: The Killer Elite, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan and Robert Duvall star in Sam Peckinpah's tense, action-packed thriller that explores savagery and betrayal in the murky world of killers-for-hire.

programme.title: Convoy, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: White Lightning, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: In one of his most memorable roles, Burt Reynolds portrays a moonshine whiskey runner who turns state's witness to avenge the murder of a boy no one understood.

programme.title: Gone In 60 Seconds, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Buckle-up as Eleanor, the fast and furious Ford Fastback Mustang, takes you on a full-throttle ride you'll never forget. The Assignment: To steal 48 muscle and exotic cars! The Challenge: Avoid getting caught!

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Music)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: Hair, (1979, Musical)
programme.desc: A country boy and Vietnam draftee embark on an adventure of a lifetime when he meets a group of counterculture hippies and his eyes are opened to the darker side of class, race, and big city life in this adaptation of the Broadway sensation.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The stage is set for the Fortune Cup as eight elite duelists vie for the chance to take on reigning champion Jack Atlas. However, for the Master of Ceremonies Rex Goodwin, it's not about who wins or loses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The second duel of the Fortune Cup is about to get under way as the mysterious duelist known as the Black Rose finds herself having to face off against a medieval menace named Sir Randsborg.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the first Turbo Duel of the Fortune Cup set to start, a surprise guest forces Yusei's competition to take an unexpected pit stop.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Director Goodwin enlists the hypnotic powers of the Professor to expose Luna as a Signer and uncover the secrets she unknowingly knows of the Duel Monsters Spirit World.
programme.sub-title: Return to the Spirit World, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between the Professor and Luna continues, Luna looks to keep a promise she made to protect the Duel Monsters Spirit World, but in order for her to succeed, she must first break free of the hypnotic hold the Professor has on her.
programme.sub-title: Return to the Spirit World, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The semifinals of the Fortune Cup are about to begin, and the first match of day two features Yusei going toe-to-toe with the tower of power - Greiger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With no cards left in his hand and his life points about to get blasted by Greiger, Yusei has one draw left to take down this tower of power to keep in the hunt to duel Jack in the championship round.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: In the second battle of the semifinals, Akiza squares off against the professional profiler Commander Koda, but with her tournament life on the line, can Akiza outplay an opponent who claims to know her every move?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the Fortune Cup Finale one win away, Yusei and Akiza get set to battle it out as Director Goodwin anxiously awaits the final Signer to reveal their Mark of the Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the back-and-forth battle between Akiza and Yusei rages on, Yusei is forced to unleash his mighty Stardust Dragon in order to stop Akiza's grisly garden from squeezing his life points into submission.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the Fortune Cup Finale about to kick into overdrive, Jack decides to clear the air and reveal the truth behind his escape from the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the finish line of the Fortune Cup fast approaching, Yusei and Jack find themselves on a collision course with destiny as they race to unlock the mystery behind the Crimson Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After defeating Jack to win the Fortune Cup Finale, Yusei is challenged to a Shadow Duel by an underground duelist whose mind has been taken over by the Dark Signers.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and his robed rival rages on, Yusei must rely on his deck if he plans to survive this Shadow Duel and uncover the truth behind the Dark Signers sinister scheme to destroy the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After agreeing to help Yusei meet with Director Goodwin, Officer Trudge unknowingly becomes one of the Dark Signers' drones and challenges a wounded Jack Atlas to a Shadow Duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Hoping to gain Yusei's trust, Director Goodwin decides to share with him the secrets behind the origin of the Satellite Sector and the ongoing war between Signer and Dark Signer.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After returning to the Satellite Sector, Yusei meets up with his old friend Crow and soon finds himself in a tag team Turbo Duel with Sector Security.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei and Crow set off to confront the Dark Signers in an effort to stop them from destroying the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: In an effort to save the Satellite Sector from being destroyed, Yusei agrees to face off against a former friend turned Dark Signer in a Shadow Duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Yusei confronts his former friend Kalin about their past in an effort to stop him from awakening the Army of Shadows.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The safety of the world hangs in the balance as Yusei tries to figure out a way to outduel and outmaneuver the unstoppable power of Kalin's dark deck.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Leo is forced to take part in an extrasensory examination with the leader of the Arcadia Movement. Can Leo pass this pop quiz, or will this psychic showdown with Sayer leave Leo locked up forever?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Lazar's creepy clowns about to crack Crow's defense, Crow hatches a plan to lull his opponent into a false sense of security so that his feathered friends can swoop in and swipe the last of Lazar's life points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei gets caught up in a web of lies after agreeing to square off against Roman, the leader of the Dark Signers.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the safety of his friends literally hanging in the balance, Yusei must figure out a way to squash Roman's Earthbound Immortal before it sends him and his pals to the Netherworld forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Luna gears up to face Devack in a Shadow Duel, but before the first card can be thrown, Luna is transported back to the Spirit World, leaving her pint-sized brother Leo the tall task of taking down this Dark Signer.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As Luna searches the Spirit World for a way to free Ancient Fairy Dragon from her stone prison, Leo searches his deck for a card combo that will help him defeat Devack and his army of apes.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Luna and her new found friend Torunka hatch a plan to free Regulus from King Zeman's minus curse. Meanwhile, back in the Satellite Sector, Leo calls upon his Power Tool Dragon to help him dismantle Devack's dark deck.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Luna's plan to free Ancient Fairy Dragon falls apart, Regulus must come to her rescue in order to save her and the Spirit World from Zeman's minus curse.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Carly sets out hoping to uncover the mystery behind the Crimson Dragon, but after digging up some damaging dirt on the Arcadia Movement, she soon finds herself squaring off in a psychic duel with Sayer.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Sayer signs up for a Shadow Duel against a Dark Signer who's out for revenge while Akiza agrees to battle a dark and sinister supermodel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the Dark Signer double duel draws to a climactic close, Carly and Misty unfold a catastrophic card combo that could send Akiza and Sayer to the Netherworld forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After Akiza falls into a state of unconsciousness, her father turns to Yusei in a last ditch effort to wake his beloved daughter from her catatonic condition.

programme.title: All hopes rest on Luffy and Law being able to take down Doflamingo; but the Warlord has other plans in mind as he gives the two the fight of their lives, and reveals his true, shocking history! Meanwhile, Sabo finds out Fujitora's true intention
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Noble Family! The True Identity of Doflamingo!

programme.title: With Fujitora's stalemate arousing suspicion in the Navy ranks, Law and Luffy stand seconds away from execution at the hand of Doflamingo! But before he dispatches them both, he shares the secret of his sway over the Celestial Dragons!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Ultimate Power! The Secret of the Op-Op Fruit!

programme.title: The horrible secret of Flevance, the White Town, is revealed, giving clues to Law's traumatic past! A rage born from the lies of the World Government created a child who had the will to kill Corazon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sad Memories! Law, the Boy from the White Town!

programme.title: Law's attack on Corazon looks less successful than he thought! And after he's accepted into the Doflamingo Family, Corazon's mysterious silence hides a fact that may save Law's life - and a hidden danger Law must face in Doflamingo himself!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Celestial Dragon! Doffy's Stormy Past!

programme.title: Things grow stranger for Law as he learns the secret behind why Corazon feigns being mute! But the mysterious Corazon's actions are only beginning to baffle Law as he takes him on a journey to cure his White Lead Disease.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Rocky Road! Law and Corazon's Journey of Life!

programme.title: Corazon's double-dealing with the Navy raises suspicions both with Doflamingo and Law. But all that is secondary as Corazon finally has a chance to grab the Op-Op Fruit during a staged handoff arranged by the Government.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Time is Ticking Down! Seize the Op-Op Fruit!

programme.title: The Op-Op Fruit is in Corazon's hands! But the price he paid to get it might be too high... When Law goes for help, unfortunate coincidences intervene and leave the two vulnerable! Meanwhile, Doflamingo and his clan finally land at Minion Island.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Moment of Resolution! Corazon's Farewell Smile!

programme.title: Doflamingo & his Family begin to zero in on Corazon and Law's whereabouts, but Corazon has a plan to hide Law long enough to let him escape, even if that means sacrificing his own life. A chain of lucky coincidences allows the plan to be set into motion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Advance, Law! The Kindhearted Man's Final Fight!

programme.title: Violet runs down the status of the open battles raging in Dressrosa - the Straw Hats, the Tontattas, the executives of the Doflamingo Family - all of them clash around the island, but it's Law's revelation to Doflamingo that moves the action forward!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Be Free! Law's Injection Shot Blasts!

programme.title: Luffy continues to battle Fake-mingo, but keeps accidentally battling Bellamy instead. Meanwhile the tide of battle turns against Law as painful scars from the past resurface. And Zoro gets unexpected help in his battle with Pica.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Intense Battle! Law vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Bellamy escapes Doflamingo's control, but it might be too late. His long history with Doflamingo unfolds and leads to an inglorious end. Meanwhile, Hajrudin has been beaten down, but a fire still burns in him to pay back the favor he owes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle Against the Executives! Proud Hajrudin!

programme.title: Lao G and Don Chinjao duke it out as each brings their most devastating attacks to the battle. But a misunderstanding caused by Baby 5 has Sai and Don Chinjao distracted - are they distracted enough for Lao G to gain the upper hand?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle of Love! The New Leader Sai vs. Baby 5!

programme.title: Law is at the whim of Doflamingo and Trebol, while Luffy still has to deal with Bellamy, who fights to keep his honor even after being released by Doflamingo! Meanwhile, Gladius is about to detonate the ground around Cavendish and Bartolomeo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Man's Pride! Bellamy's Last Charge!

programme.title: A mysterious force that resembles Cavendish menaces the battlefield - but while it appears to help Bartolomeo and the others at first, it sets its sights on Robin! Meanwhile, the deeply-wounded Ideo sees Dellinger's horrible true nature!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Strong Wind and a Surge! Hakuba vs. Dellinger!

programme.title: Bartolomeo is in a neck-and-neck battle against Gladius to save Robin, and is faced with an impossible dilemma. With all his options leading to their defeat, can his cunning ploy save the day? Meanwhile, Robin is face to face with Cavendish.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Princess Mansherry's amazing power - to heal living beings completely - is in the hands of the Donquixote executive. If she is able to heal all the executives who've gone down in battle - the Straw Hats and their allies stand no chance!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Seor Pink and Franky continue their knock-down, drag-out, manly fight. As both of them are pushed to their limits, we learn Seor's tragic past! Meanwhile, Princess Mansherry's rescue hits a snag as she stubbornly refuses to leave!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Manly Duel! Seor's Elegy of Love!

programme.title: Franky and Seor Pink end their harrowing duel in a manly way - but victory knocks the wind out of even the winner's sails! Meanwhile, Diamante and Kyros struggle desperately on the Sunflower Field, each demonstrating their extreme prowess.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Stardust of Death! Diamante's Storm of Vicious Attacks!

programme.title: Kyros, unbowed by Diamante's vicious attacks, fights back with the anger and retribution of all of Dressrosa in order to fulfill his promise to protect Rebecca. If he is successful, only a few executives will remain.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Pica loses his temper and turns his full wrath against King Riku, whom he hopes to destroy, ending the revolution against Doflamingo. Meanwhile, Zoro, who has been distracted by Pica and drawn far from the battle, has to hatch a plan to save the king!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Moving Across the Ground! The Giant Statue Pica's Surprise Maneuver!

programme.title: With the lives of King Riku, Usopp, and the others on the old King's Plateau in the balance, Zoro must dig deep and discover a powerful technique to counter Pica's near-unstoppable onslaught. Meanwhile, King Riku ponders what it means to be a good king.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle in Midair! Zoro's New Special Secret Technique Blasts!

programme.title: Zoro finishes off Pica, and those below his crumbling body rush to find shelter. Meanwhile, the Tontattas finish up demolishing the SMILE Factory, and Luffy's hand is forced in his duel with Bellamy!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Taking down Bellamy only enrages Luffy in his fight against Doflamingo, his anger multiplying when he finds Law's lifeless body! Meanwhile, Doflamingo takes the next step to end the game he started, which will endanger everybody in Dressrosa!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Birdcage draws tighter and tighter around Dressrosa, threatening to destroy all life on the island kingdom! Meanwhile, Doflamingo stands down Luffy for a final confrontation, but a surprising twist shocks everyone on the top of the Royal Palace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Blade of Tenacity! The Gamma Knife Counterattack!

programme.title: Law's attack proves powerful - but Doflamingo's power has depths which he and Luffy haven't bargained for. When Doflamingo makes his counterattack, Luffy stares him down with an amazing power.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Collision of Haki! Luffy vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Trebol's wrath is fully inflamed as Law summons enough energy to speak, denouncing the Doflamingo Family executives as pawns in Doflamingo's game. But Law gathers enough energy to do more than just speak out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unassailable! The Stunning Secret of Trebol!

programme.title: Cavendish has to make a difficult decision when the severely wounded Law begs him to be left behind. Meanwhile, seeing even his Second Gear or Third Gear attacks aren't working against Doflamingo, Luffy decides to use his ultimate technique!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Erupts! I Will Take Everything upon Myself!

programme.title: Luffy and Doflamingo duke it out while the Birdcage tightens its grip on Dressrosa! Zoro sets off with a plan to stop it from slicing apart the country, while Luffy's Fourth Gear proves quite potent against Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Birdcage continues its merciless constriction, sending the residents of Dressrosa fleeing towards the center of the island, while King Riku calls out to his people: Survive long enough for Luffy to vanquish the last of the royal family.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Fourth Gear gives Luffy the power he needs to head off Doflamingo at every strike! But the energy required to keep Fourth Gear going starts to take a toll on Luffy. Will he have enough left to finish the job?
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Bounce-man's power has drained Luffy, leaving him in need of a rest before he can reuse his Haki, but luckily the gladiators from the Colosseum have come around and are focusing on taking down Doflamingo! Sabo steps in at a crucial moment.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Flame Dragon King! Protect Luffy's Life!

programme.title: With Luffy and so many of the Straw Hats' allies incapacitated, victory seems inevitable for Doflamingo - but the compassion of Mansherry may be enough to turn the tide and renew their hope - to stop the Birdcage!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: With just over a minute to spare, everyone in Dressrosa turns their efforts towards slowing down the Birdcage as it squeezes the life out of the country! Meanwhile, Viola seeks Doflamingo out herself, for a shocking confrontation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: As Long as We Breathe! Stop the Deadly Birdcage!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A ring called the Star of Alaska holds a single wheat seed inside it. The seed is a new species of wheat that can grow in minus 40 degrees and the CIA and KGB are determined to get their hands on it.
programme.sub-title: The Star of Alaska Is a Ticket to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon, now that he's won Fujiko's hand in marriage after stealing Marie Antoinette's wedding dress and ring.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A massive amount of gold is being transported in the cover of darkness, but on this rainy night, Lupin is busy being a bartender to a beautiful woman named Sara.
programme.sub-title: The Name of the Cocktail Is Revenge

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal an exquisite painting of a young girl from a Renoir art exhibit. Using the painting as bait, Lupin and his gang plan to steal Ghellon's impressive art collection.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: John Decker, an oil tycoon from Colorado hires Lupin to steal the US presidential limousine and promises to pay 10 million dollars in return.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were scoping out their next target, Macintosh Jewelry, the world's most expensive jewelry store when they end up inadvertently saving a young boy who was being kidnapped.
programme.sub-title: Boy Genius Plays a Dangerous Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang make off with the New York Mafia's secret cash hoard. However, the suitcases were filled with old newspapers and as retribution, the mafia puts a hefty bounty on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang blow up Fontaubert Bank's underground safe to steal 5 tons worth of gold, but someone has beaten them to it. The thieves are a pair of disguise artists named John and Mary.
programme.sub-title: The Target Beyond the Snowy Field

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Eagle of Helazard from a luxury cruise ship, but Fujiko betrays them at the last moment and makes off with the Eagle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata is even more determined to capture Lupin after an incident with Anne. Lupin and his gang will soon learn that Inspector Zenigata is a force to be reckoned with when he's raging mad.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon has been thrown into prison for a crime he did not commit. He is charged with cutting off the Little Mermaid's arm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious army steals 3 tons worth of gold under Inspector Zenigata's watch. His superiors are convinced Lupin stole the gold and holds Inspector Zenigata responsible.
programme.sub-title: Give the Gold to My Rival

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has lottery fever, or to be specific, has his eyes set on the 50 million dollar jackpot. However, Lupin discovers the lottery is rigged.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'tat is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Count Bone and Lord Wave operate the Rondo Insurance Company. The two seem like perfect English gentlemen, but they make their money through dirty tactics.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: At Fujiko's request, Lupin steals the Hina dolls given to the US Vice President by the Deputy Prime Minister of Japan. However, the doll heist was a trap laid out by Fujiko and her partner, Barracuda.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The 100-carat blue diamond, known as Hades' Tear is auctioned off at 1 billion dollars along with its accompanying Hades statue to the KL Foundation of Kingsland. Lupin and Jigen make off with Hades' Tear with ease, but they find out it's only glass.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mexico's richest woman, Madame Tequila owns a black diamond named the Black Pig of Mexico. Realizing that Lupin is after her diamond, Madame Tequila appoints Inspector Zenigata to guard it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Ivanov, the Soviet Union's newest atomic submarine from the Port of Arkhangelsk. Lupin becomes entangled in a fierce tug of war between the KGB and CIA when Fujiko decides to sell it to the highest bidder.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #9 Islands of Assasins
programme.desc: The den of the deadly Tarantulas gang, this island is the most dangerous place on Earth and Lupin's right in the middle of it! A dark mystery haunts his past, and the key to it is on the island.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #10 Tokyo Crisis
programme.desc: When Lupin and his bandit buddies attempt to steal a set of historically significant photographic plates, it turns out they're not the only ones with eyes on the prize in this thievish tale of mayhem and millionaires.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: Apocalypto, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Deep Impact, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a couple of young astronomers discover an enormous comet on course to collide with Earth, the countdown to doomsday begins and the human race embarks on the fight for survival.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Guerra ao Terror

programme.title: Deus da guerra
programme.desc: Na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang conquista uma importante vitria contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exrcito chins. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nao mais uma vez atacada, Qi se v obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: Dose Dupla
programme.desc: Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operao secreta acaba gerando resultados catastrficos.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante
programme.desc: Na Londres de 1960, um faxineiro convence uma executiva frustrada a planejar o roubo de diamantes na empresa onde trabalham. Chocada com a proposta do educado senhor, ela aceita, mas no demora muito para um investigador desconfie dela.

programme.title: Armas, Mulheres e Apostas
programme.desc: Depois do roubo de uma inestimvel mscara de guerra Apache de um cassino indiano, uma srie de criminosos chega a uma cidade com a esperana de recuperar o tesouro roubado.

programme.title: Caada ao Presidente
programme.desc: Aps o avio em que estava ter sido abatido por terroristas, o presidente dos Estados Unidos est ferido e perdido no meio de uma zona rural finlandesa. E sua vida agora est nas mos de Oskari um tmido jovem de treze anos de idade.

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo
programme.desc: Um bombeiro fora de servio testemunha um assassinato nas mos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteo a testemunhas at depor, mas no pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, ento decide agir por conta prpria.

programme.title: Zona Mortal
programme.desc: Um criminoso consegue fugir de paraquedas quando transportado em um avio da polcia. Por causa disso, o agente Pete Nessip que o acompanhava suspenso, mas decide procurar o preso fugitivo por conta prpria.

programme.title: O Guardio
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo Mxico para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresrio. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgat-la e proteg-la.

programme.title: Fuga alucinante
programme.desc: Com uma bomba-relgio pendurada no pescoo, um jovem corre contra o relgio e todos os tipos de inimigos enquanto vai de um lado a outro da cidade na tentativa de salvar a si mesmo e sua namorada.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Para deter um assassino racista, Shaft precisa localizar as nicas testemunhas que podem coloc-lo atrs das grandes. O perigo s aumenta enquanto Shaft investiga.

programme.title: Fantasmas de Guerra
programme.desc: Cinco experientes soldados americanos so designados para defender um castelo francs perto do final da Segunda Guerra Mundial.

programme.title: O Massacre

programme.title: A partida final do Football Frontier entre Raimon e Lua Nova tudo o que resta. Antes do jogo, Heath se encontra com o presidente da Gekko Electronics e lder do programa Juzo de Ares.
programme.desc: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin - S1E24

programme.title: Embora Joey destrua os pontos de vida de Yugi, Yugi no consegue atacar seu querido amigo! Yugi invoca o monstro favorito de Joey, o Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos, para fazer Joey recobrar os sentidos.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E27

programme.title: Yugi comea a quebrar o feitio de Marik sobre Joey, mas agora ter que duelar sem o Enigma do Milnio! Quando Joey compra a carta necessria para dizimar os pontos de vida de Yugi, quais so as chances de Yugi, principalmente sozinho?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E28

programme.title: S falta um minuto de duelo, at que o perdedor seja enviado para afundar nas profundezas do mar! Ser que estes grandes amigos levaro um ao outro perdio? Pode ser que haja uma salvadora especial, que acabou de recuperar a viso...
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E29

programme.title: a batalha dos espectros, e Bakura libera seu exrcito de fantasmas contra os zumbis devotos de Bonz, em busca do direito de entrar nos Duelos Finais da Cidade de Batalhas! Mas para quem o sino final tocar quando este duelo se der no Reino das Sombras?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E30

programme.title: o jogo do amor, quando o gal de Hollywood Jean-Claude Magnum desafia Mai para um duelo para ganhar sua mo em casamento! Ser que Mai sucumbir ao charme de Jean-Claude, para no mencionar sua esquadra de monstros-ninja?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E31

programme.title: Que comecem os Duelos Finais da Cidade de Batalhas! A habilidade e resistncia dos oito finalistas sero testadas ao extremo em uma arena de duelos suspensa a 300 metros de altura!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E32

programme.title: o primeiro dos Duelos Finais da Cidade de Batalhas, e Yugi luta contra o esprito maligno do Anel do Milnio, que possui Bakura! Yugi destri os espectros grotescos de Bakura rapidamente, mas Bakura tem uma estratgia sada direto do cemitrio...
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E33

programme.title: Bakura aciona a Tbua do Destino, que far Yugi perder automaticamente em cinco turnos! Como se isso j no fosse ruim, o Santurio das Trevas de Bakura afeta os pontos de vida de Yugi a cada ataque! Incapaz de atacar e ficando sem tempo, Yugi est preso!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E34

programme.title: Slifer, o Drago Celeste de Yugi expelir seu ltimo sopro e vencer o duelo, mas Bakura poder no sobreviver a rajada do todo-poderoso Monstro Deus Egpcio!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E35

programme.title: A origem das Cartas dos Deuses Egpcios finalmente revelada! O misterioso Shadi leva Yugi a uma jornada de volta criao de Duel Monsters... e os perigosos poderes com ela liberados!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E36

programme.title: No segundo dos Duelos Finais da Cidade de Batalhas, Odion, disfarado de Marik, confunde Joey com vrias armadilhas. No entanto, Joey tem Tornado Gigante, a defesa perfeita para a estratgia de Odion, que garante a vitria de Joey...
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E37

programme.title: A Encarnao de Apophis de Odion destri brutalmente os monstros de Joey... e seus pontos de vida! Ser que Joey pode usar eficientemente os monstros que ele ganhou antes, ou j est afobado demais para montar um contra-ataque bem-sucedido?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E38

programme.title: uma verdadeira comilana, e a Serket de Odion devora os monstros de Joey, mutando para estgios de evoluo mais e mais poderosos! Como Joey pode derrotar a Serket se ela engole os monstros de Joey quando eles so invocados?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E39

programme.title: Odion usa uma Carta Deus Egpcio falsa para invocar o terceiro Monstro Deus Egpcio, o Drago Alado de R, e o usa para aniquilar o resto dos pontos de vida de Joey.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E40

programme.title: O terceiro dos Duelos Finais da Cidade de Batalhas, entre Mai e Marik, no nada ordinrio. uma batalha no temido Reino das Sombras, onde perder pontos de vida equivale a perder memrias!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E41

programme.title: Ao passo que Mai perde mais e mais memrias com o ataque implacvel de Marik, ela perde confiana em suas habilidades para duelar.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E42

programme.title: Mai ganha controle do Drago Alado de R de Marik, mas incapaz de decifrar como liberar suas habilidades extremamente poderosas!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E43

programme.title: No quarto dos Duelos Finais da Cidade de Batalhas, o oponente misterioso de Kaiba ... Ishizu! Com o poder de seu Colar do Milnio, Ishizu pode ver o futuro, inclusive cada carta que Kaiba est planejando jogar!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E44

programme.title: Usando a mgica de seu Colar do Milnio, Ishizu j viu o resultado do duelo ela derrotar Kaiba com sua armadilha! Como Kaiba pode vencer quando ele j est destinado a perder? hora de Kaiba mudar o futuro!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E45

programme.title: Com a maldade de Marik crescendo, Ishizu revela os segredos da linhagem dela: como Marik passou a ser, de uma criana generosa, um tirano em busca de poder e do domnio mundial? Ser que Yugi pode salvar Marik, ou ele est alm da salvao?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E46

programme.title: Com o pacto anterior quebrado, Bakura duela contra Marik pelo direito de controlar o Cetro do Milnio e o Anel do Milnio, e o perdedor ficar preso no Reino das Sombras para sempre!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E47

programme.title: Bakura e o Marik bom invocam o Drago Alado de R, prontos para atacar e banir o Marik mau para o Reino das Sombras! Porm, o Drago Alado de R tem mais de uma habilidade especial, e o Marik mau sabe como usar todas elas!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S2E48

programme.title: Enquanto acelera para a Ilha da KaibaCorp para as etapas finais do Torneio da Cidade de Batalhas, o dirigvel de Kaiba capturado por um jovem misterioso chamado Noah e seus capangas cinco inimigos do passado de Yugi e Kaiba em busca de vingana.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S3E1

programme.title: Noah exibe o poder de seu mundo virtual separando a turma de Yugi, enviando-os para os confins de seu prprio universo!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S3E2

programme.title: Enquanto Yugi luta para entender o Sistema de Mestre do Deck, o Figuro 1 usa sua habilidade com o sistema para mandar os ataques de Yugi de volta para ele vez aps vez! Como Yugi derrotar seu oponente com seus ataques eliminando seus pontos de vida?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S3E3

programme.title: Kohaku permanece inconsciente depois de ser encarado por Magatsuhi, a vontade do mal. Kagome est preocupada, mas ela tem que se curvar e estudar para os exames de admisso, ento ela decide voltar para casa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E18

programme.title: Sesshoumaru persegue a m vontade, Magatsuhi. Mas apenas parte de uma armadilha criada por Byakuya dos Sonhos. Magatsuhi encontra Kohaku inconsciente, e ele tenta entregar seu fragmento de Shikon para Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E19

programme.title: Naraku est atrs do ltimo fragmento de Shikon e ele toma Kagome como refm.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E20

programme.title: Kagome se forma no ensino mdio e retorna era feudal. Shippo e Kohaku ficam na aldeia de Kaede, enquanto o resto da gangue se dirige para a batalha de Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E21

programme.title: O corao de Inuyasha devorado pelo veneno da Jia de Shikon, e ele se transforma em sua forma demonaca. Ele machuca Kagome e a escurido em seu corao toma conta dele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E22

programme.title: Os poderes espirituais de Kagome so restaurados e a luz divina revivida na Jia Shikon de Naraku. No entanto, Naraku usa isso como um chamariz para atrair Sango em sua armadilha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E23

programme.title: Naraku tem vivido como um demnio apesar de ter um corao humano. Enquanto lutava contra ele, Kagome pergunta sobre seu verdadeiro desejo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E24

programme.title: Naraku se dirige para o Poo do Comedor de Ossos e desaparece! Antes de desaparecer, Naraku faz seu ltimo desejo para Kagome, ferido pelas mos de Byakuya, ser engolido em Meido, o caminho para o submundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E25

programme.title: Quando a ltima pessoa a obter a Jia Shikon faz o nico desejo correto, a jia ser purificada e desaparecer inteiramente deste mundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - S1E26

programme.title: Anos aps ser selado, Inuyasha, o meio-youkai acordado por uma garota do ensino mdio chamada Agome, que viajou no tempo atraves do poo Come-Ossos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Concedido o poder de controlar Inuyasha, Agome descobre que ela pode ser a reencarnao da irm mais velha de Kaede, Kikyo, que selou Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E2

programme.title: Agome e Inuyasha precisam das habilidades do outro para reunir os fragmentos dispersos da Jia de Quatro Almas, mas os dois no se do bem.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E3

programme.title: De volta ao presente, Agome est relaxando em casa quando Inuyasha vem procur-la, e ela retorna com ele ao passado para encontrar Yura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E4

programme.title: O meio irmo de Inuyasha, Sesshomaru, aparece procurando pelo tmulo de seu pai que era um youkai-cachorro. Agome aprende sobre o passado de Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E5

programme.title: Apesar da ajuda de Agome em frustr-lo, Sesshomaru descobre a localizao do tmulo do pai de Inuyasha, que contm uma espada que ele deseja.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E6

programme.title: Agome capaz de puxar a espada Tessaiga para fora do altar, e Sesshomaru tenta mat-la, irritando Inuyasha e provocando um duelo de irmos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E7

programme.title: Inuyasha e Agome encontram um jovem samurai chamado Nobunaga cujo senhor foi possudo por um youkai Sapo, e eles partiram para resgatar uma princesa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E8

programme.title: Em sua jornada, Inuyasha e Agome encontram Shippo, um jovem youkai raposa que rouba um pedao da Jia para vingar seu pai assassinado.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E9

programme.title: Inuyasha duela com Hiten enquanto Shippo tenta usar sua magia para resgatar Agome de Manten, mas os Irmos Relmpago no sero derrotados to facilmente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E10

programme.title: Quando Agome retorna ao presente, o poder da Jia de Quatro Almas incita uma antiga mscara de noh para atacar seu av.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E11

programme.title: Inuyasha v um youkai chamado Tatarimokke que guia benevolentemente os espritos das crianas, enquanto Agome encontra o esprito de uma garota chamada Mayu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E12

programme.title: Depois que Inuyasha e Agome resgatam uma garota chamada Nazuna, eles passam a noite juntos em um santurio e aprendem mais sobre a transformao de Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E13

programme.title: O bando se encontra nas docas e acaba cercado pela Marinha. Usando Nami como falsa refm, eles conseguem fazer os inimigos os deixarem subir a bordo do Merry novamente.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E67

programme.title: O bando disfara o Merry de navio da Marinha para que consigam recuperar seu tesouro. Com o ouro, eles decidem que vo contratar um construtor naval.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E68

programme.title: Usopp separa o bando em dois: a equipe de recuperao do ouro e a de recuperao do waver. Shepherd decide capturar Luffy por conta prpria.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E69

programme.title: Zoro, Usopp, Sanji e Robin continuam a busca pelo tesouro, e Luffy leva Nami aos aposentos do capito para recuperar o ouro.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E70

programme.title: O Merry acaba encalhado na mar baixa e Jonathan acredita ter conseguido seu xeque-mate. O Discador de Impacto impulsiona o navio, e os Discadores de Sopro e de Chamas inflam o balo polvo novamente, para a fuga.
programme.desc: One Piece - S3E71

programme.title: Luffy e seus companheiros sobrevivem a um encontro quase mortal com monstros martimos, mas acabam em uma misteriosa ilha onde tudo muito mais comprido do que deveria ser!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E1

programme.title: Luffy acaba envolvido em uma Davy Back Fight com os Piratas de Foxy. O Chapu de Palha nunca foge de um desafio, mas nesta disputa pode perder seus companheiros!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E2

programme.title: A Davy Back comea com uma Donut Race ao redor de Long Ring Long Land! O bando enfrenta Foxy para decidir quem perder um membro da tripulao!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E3

programme.title: Nami usa suas habilidades de navegao para colocar o bando beira da vitria, mas Foxy tem mais do que alguns meros truques sujos na manga!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E4

programme.title: Graas a uma trapaa de Foxy, Chopper acaba perdido para o inimigo. A nica esperana de recuper-lo jaz em Zoro e Sanji, mas eles precisaro aprender a trabalhar juntos para salvar a pobre rena!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E5

programme.title: Sanji e Zoro apanham, mas no desistem. Com uma pitada de sorte - e um pouco de trabalho em equipe - eles saem vitoriosos do segundo round da Davy Back Fight!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E6

programme.title: O Round 3 da Davy Back Fight uma corrida num circuito oval! O destino de Chopper est por um triz, e o bando tem um problema: Luffy no sabe andar de patins!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E7

programme.title: Nas voltas finais da ltima disputa da Davy Back Fight, Luffy e os Chapus de Palha precisam vencer para recuperar Chopper dos Piratas Foxy!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E8

programme.title: Na segunda Davy Back Fight, a primeira partida um jogo de queimada entre os Chapus de Palha de Luffy e os Piratas Foxy!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E9

programme.title: Na sequncia da segunda Davy Back Fight, Nami, Usopp, Chopper, Sanji e Zoro precisam disputar o Dodge Touch Daruma, uma brincadeira de Sinal Verde, Sinal Vermelho entre piratas!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E10

programme.title: O final da Davy Back Fight tem Luffy e Foxy frente a frente, homem a homem, at o fim, por suas tripulaes!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E11

programme.title: A terceira partida da Davy Back Fight pe, frente a frente, Foxy Raposa de Prata dos Piratas Foxy e Afro-Luffy Chapu de Palha dos Chapus de Palha, at o fim, tudo ou nada!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E12

programme.desc: One Piece - S4E13

programme.desc: One Piece - S4E14
